programme.title: Hotel Hell

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: A Top End trawler demolition bites back for Team Salvage as a five-meter croc patrols the area on a free-for-all mechanical nightmare; Shaun and Sarah dig deep as a wreck on the beach pushes them to breaking point.

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: On the tropical frontier of the Northern Territory, Team Salvage take on a time-critical mission to re-float and recover a derelict 20-ton yacht that's been blown ashore.

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: At a marine sanctuary in the far Northern Territory, Team Salvage must overcome a mechanical catastrophe to recover a beached 7-ton Catamaran.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon goes to Hampshire to help a supper club that is so exclusive it hardly has any customers.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon attempts to help two friends save their failing restaurant from corporate competition.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon attempts to help turn around a family-run bistro with hideous decor, bad food and a chef who can't face up to his mistakes.

programme.desc: Sue Ray, owner of Bonapartes Restaurant, gets some help reviving the business.

programme.desc: Team Salvage is on a time-critical mission to retrieve a scammed derelict yacht.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: Paramedics of the Yorkshire Air Ambulance crew assist in the desperate search for a factory worker's severed arm. Also, the team is called to the icy streets of an automobile accident where an elderly passenger is trapped in an overturned car.

programme.desc: The paramedics head to the Peak District where a mountain biker has suffered a broken neck.

programme.desc: Paramedics of the Yorkshire Air Ambulance crew respond to a woman critically injured in a head-on collision and fear she may be bleeding internally; the team scrambles to locate an injured walker in the massive expanse of a national park.

programme.desc: The prison's routines and systems start getting to Gordon, and he struggles to keep his team in line.

programme.desc: Gordon invites players from the coffee shop industry are to the prison to try some of the food.
